title: Call today to schedule your in person tour! 1 and 2 Bedrooms!
posting_body: ['Schedule your in person tour for this large and spacious 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment home ready for you today!', 'Are you working from home and in need of space?', 'This unit has a huge living room space, galley style kitchen with new flooring and all new appliances.', 'Great balcony to relax on.', 'We welcome you to stop by and take advantage of this great apartment home.', 'WILL NEED WHEN APPLYING', 'A government issued ID', 'A Copy of your Social Security Card', 'An application for everyone moving in over the age of 18', 'An application fee of $40.00', 'A Holding deposit of $200.00.', 'If approved this amount will go towards your security deposit.', 'Security deposit starts at $1200 on approval of good credit and references.', 'We do conduct income, rental, background and credit checks.', 'We require, as a household, that the income be at least 2 ½ times the rent.', '(Verifiable income)', "Cashier's Checks or Money Orders Only", 'PET POLICY', 'Must be under 25 pounds', '2 pets per household', '$45 (per pet) pet rent', '$500 (per pet) deposit', 'Ask about our breed restrictions', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Welcome to Evergreen Ridge Apartments.', 'Our apartments offer an enviable location near great shopping and delicious local restaurants just minutes away from your doorstep.', 'If you feel like going for a bike ride or jog, wonderful trails are located nearby for your enjoyment!', 'The surroundings at Evergreen live up to the community’s name, with idyllically kept trees and a charming courtyard.', 'Here at Evergreen Ridge Apartments, we are dedicated to ensuring your comfort.', 'Our attentive staff is here to ensure your home is always in excellent shape, and we respond quickly to maintenance needs when they arise.', 'We offer a selection of one and two bedroom homes within the community ensuring that you find the perfect combination of floor plan and features.', 'If you are ready to make Evergreen Ridge Apartment homes your next home.', 'Choose your new home today!', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'One assigned parking space w/ one additional open parking spot for assigned vehicles.', 'Flexible Leases', 'Laundry on site', 'Living room', 'Kitchen', 'Dining room', 'All electric appliances', 'Amble closet space', 'Stove / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage disposal', 'Balcony, Deck, or Patio', 'Ceiling fans', 'Cable-Ready', '6 Laundry facilities', 'Water, Sewage and Garbage Set Rate', 'Evergreen Ridge Apartments', '3815 Susan Drive, San Bruno, CA 94066', 'CONTACT INFORMATION', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'Open Mon-Sat 9am-6pm', 'Located in San Bruno, San Mateo County.', 'Near South San Francisco, Daly City, Pacifica.', 'Prices, availability, and terms are subject to change without notice and subject to approval of application and credit.', 'Pet restrictions: size and breed; additional security deposit; monthly pet rent.']
